attributes.action: Guarantee a minimum of 10,000 Coronavirus tests a day for the next two months
attributes.additional_details: We need the UK government to be transparent with the public and get everyone who shows symptoms tested, getting updates every 24 hours on how the situation evolves.
attributes.background: Only some critical cases who have been abroad or in contact with infected people are being tested for COVID-19. This is preventing the public from getting access to the real number of people infected and take adequate action, in order to avoid overwhelming the NHS in a few weeks time.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301354

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
